Package myVelib

package myVelib
  • Class
    Description
    Bicycle
    There exist several types of bicycle, and their cost can vary It is the visitable in the visitor pattern
    BicycleType
    enumeration for the type of bike
    CLUI
    Command in line user interface for monitoring myVelib networks Handles the following commands: setup velibnetworkName Creates a myVelib network with given name and consisting of 10 stations each of which has 10 parking slots and such that stations are arranged on a square grid whose of side 4km and initially populated with a 75% bikes randomly distributed over the 10 stations The creation date is automatically set to 01/01/2022 setup name nstations nslots s nbikes Creates a myVelib network of side s with given name and consisting of nbikes and nstations stations each of which has nslots parking slots The creation date is automatically set to 01/01/2022 addUser userName cardType velibnetworkName Add a new User named userName with a registration card (NoCard, Vmax, Vlibre) in velibnetworkName addUser userName cardType velibnetworkName ID Add a new User named userName with a registration card (NoCard, Vmax, Vlibre) in velibnetworkName with a specific ID addStation locationX locationY type nslots nbikes year month day hour minutes velibnetworkName Add a new station in velibnetworkName at a specific location with nslots and nbikes (need to specify the date of creation) addStation locationX invalid input: '<'locationY type nslots nbikes year month day hour minutes velibnetworkName ID Add a new station in velibnetworkName at a specific location with nslots, nbikes and specific ID (need to specify the date of creation) offline velibnetworkName stationID Put the station stationID in velibnetworkName offline online velibnetworkName stationID Put the station stationID in velibnetworkName online planClassicRide userID destinationX destinationY bicycleType year month day hour minutes velibnetworkName Plan a new ride for the user userID going to a specific destination and with a specific type of bicycle in velibnetworkName (need to specify the date of the planning) startRide userID year month day hour minutes velibnetworkName Start the planned ride for the user userID in velibnetworkName at a specific date endRide userID year month day hour minutes velibnetworkName Start the current ride for the user userID in velibnetworkName at a specific date cancelRide userID velibnetworkName Cancel the planned ride of user userID in velibnetworkName displayStation invalid input: '<'elibnetworkName stationID Display the statistics of the station stationID in velibnetworkName displayUser velibnetworkName userID Display the statistics of the user userID in velibnetworkName sortStation velibnetworkName sortpolicy Display the stations of velibnetworkName sorted according to the sort policy display velibnetworkName Display the stations, the users and the parking slots of a network display Display the list of networks created
    Counter
    Class to count the number of rents and drops
    CreditCard
    Class for the credit card
    DistanceStationComparator
    Class to sort the stations according to their distance to a point
    ElectricalBicycle
    Mechanical bicycle
    History
    class used to register in the system each evants that happens in the myvelib system.
    LineToFunction
    Class to analyze strings and deduce what to do
    Location
    class representing a location in X Y coordinates
    MechanicalBicycle
    Mechanical bicycle
    MyVelib
    Class representing the whole system
    NoCard
    Class for the users who don't have any card
    OccupiedStationComparator
    Comparator for station to sort them according to their occupation
    ParkingSlot
    ParkingSlot is a Class that represents every parking slot of all stations
    ParkingSlotHistory
    class for an history of a parking slot
    ParkingSlotState
    enumeration to register into a parking slot its state
    Plan
    a class that regroups all methods to compute plan for each ride.
    RegistrationCard
    There exist several types of card, each one has a different cost policy.
    Ride
    Contains all the information about a ride Client in the visitor pattern
    RideState
    enumeration for the states of a ride
    RunTest
    Class to read a txt file and execute all its commands
    Station
    Station is a class that represent a station
    StationStatistics
    All statistics about the Stations
    StationType
    enumeration for the type of station
    Statistics
    a Class containing all methods used to compute and display statistics about MyVelib system
    UsedStationComparator
    Comparator for station to sort them according to their utilization
    User
    Class for representing a user
    UserStatistics
    All statistics about the users
    Vlibre
    Vlibre registration card
    Vmax
    Vmax registration card
